H0.text: The dominant trait will be visible when both a dominant and recessive gene are present.

H1.text: The recessive trait will be visible when both a dominant and recessive gene are present.

H2.text: Neither trait will be visible when both a dominant and recessive gene are present.

H3.text: It cannot be predicted which trait will be visible when both a dominant and recessive gene are present.

A4.text: In Rr (heterozygous) individuals, the R allele masks the presence of the r allele, so these individuals also have round peas.

A5.text: the R allele masks the presence of the r allele
